title: Bangkok Thai Moods
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Ovo, Thai, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. As of July 2012 only restaurant in Cascais that serves several soy beef and tofu dishes. Has vegan options.  Outside seating is in a pedestrian only alley. Ambiance inside is dark colors, nice lighting, Buddha statues and Thai decorations. Friendly and helpful staff.
